electricityContract.terms: Please visit www.lumoenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.lumoenergy.com.au/metering-and-solar. We will issue your bill at least quarterly, or if you have a Smart Meter, monthly, unless you have requested to be billed quarterly or your Smart Meter does not have active telecommunications.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to small business customers currently within the Citipower distribution zone with applicable network tariff. For more information contact 1300 115 866.

demandCharges.description: Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between 10am - 6pm Monday to Friday including public holidays.
Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between 10am - 6pm Monday to Friday including public holidays.

greenPowerCharges.description: For an extra 3.3 cents per kWh Lumo will purchase 10% of your consumption from GreenPower accredited sources.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
